item.title: TamuCTF 2017 - Pwn 1
item.description: TamuCTF 2017 Pwn1 - 50 Points We are told that there is a binary running remotely and its code is available to download. Lets download and open it with r2. $ wget https://ctf.tamu.edu/files/7e968d03d9caa11a2f4f2909bd3cabc9/pwn1 $ r2 pwn1 Now that the binary is opened, we need to analyze its content. [0xf7721ac0]> aaa # Analyze [0xf7721ac0]> afl # List functions found . . 0x0804854b 4 103 sym.print_flag 0x080485b2 4 120 main .
